thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: Rosanna Munoz

author: Rosanna Munoz
title: Rosanna Munoz
text:
I love Homeadvisor.com! When I submit a project, I have contractors calling me within seconds (literally!)
We even had a call from our Homeadvisor project manager to see how our project was coming along and to let us know another contractor in our area was available for the project. He got them in contact with us.
This is a GREAT service for finding contractors in your area!
